name: Bus Off, this is my seat
name_original: Bus Off, this is my seat
description:
It's a game in which you are a bus driver and have to manage the happiness of your bus by letting younger people give up their seats for older ones. It's a tiny game that shows how a small act of kindness can bring you a long way.

We believe that, as long as everyone works together, the world, and of course, your bus too, can become a happier place.

This game is an entry for the Warmest Game Jam, where we will try to collect as much as possible donations for the Warmste Week! Please enjoy this game and make  a small donation for TEJO!
